sentences.sentence: The new manager has been hailed as the saviour of the club.
sentences.translation: 新任经理被誉为俱乐部的救星。

sentences.sentence: The football community built him up as the saviour of the sport.
sentences.translation: 足球界曾把他吹捧为这项运动的救星。

sentences.sentence: I, even I, am the LORD; and beside me there is no saviour.
sentences.translation: 惟有我是耶和华，除我以外没有救主。
